summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to disposition of City real property in the Pike Place Urban Renewal Project area; authorizing an agreement with the Pike Place Market Preservation and Development Authority for the transfer to the Authority of a parcel of land at 1416 Western Avenue for development of low-income housing and a senior services center; and authorizing delivery of a deed and other actions to implement the agreement; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Neighborhoods, Arts and Civil Rights Committee
note: Creamery Site Sale, Pike Place Senior Center expansion
